replies.body: why would u make it that the battle orbs are better than the MSI orbs. made me waste $50 on useless MSI Orbs where i could get the battle orbs and have a chance for a goodie bag.
why spend money on something if you're gonna be upset about it? riot didn't make you waste $50, you spent $50 because you liked what you were buying?
The post already told you about the orbs, even ingame if u scrolled down in the "learn more" for the trials pass. You just had to be patient for it to be released.
oh must of not seen the post than. My bad
